revised_title: Deriving Flux Integral for Perturbed Static Space-Times Using Einstein Pseudo-Tensor
tldr: The authors rederive the flux integral for axisymmetric polar perturbations of static vacuum space-times using the Einstein pseudo-tensor. They also demonstrate how to generalize this method for Einstein-Maxwell space-times, overcoming previous limitations with the Landau-Lifshitz pseudo-tensor. This work provides a valuable computational tool for understanding the behavior of perturbed space-times in the context of general relativity.
